## EthersLiquity.transferCollateralGainToTrove() method

Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base-u.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transferCollateralGainToTrove(overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<CollateralGainTransferDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[CollateralGainTransferDetails](./lib-base-u.collateralgaintransferdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.

## Remarks

The collateral gain is transfered to the Trove as additional collateral.

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [LQTY reward](./lib-base-u.stabilitydeposit.lqtyreward.md)<!-- -->.
